item.title: Science Sunday: RGB LED Power Consumption Calculator
item.description: Before delving much-too-far down the rabbit hole of flashy, over-engineered lamp repairs and Arduino funtimes, I thought it advantageous to take an educated guess at the maximum power consumption of replacing some existing LEDs in a friends now-exploded lamp with WS2812 “NeoPixel Stick” clones. Num. LEDs {{ bgcolor }} Red mA Green mA Blue mA Max mA {{ out.rgbMa }} Red % Green % Blue % Total Bright.
